Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class WayangPlan

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.WayangPlan
public class WayangPlan extends Object
A Wayang plan consists of a set of Operators.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WayangPlan(Operator... sinks)
    Creates a new instance and does some preprocessing (such as loop isolation).

  • Constructor Details

    • WayangPlan

      public WayangPlan(Operator... sinks)
      Creates a new instance and does some preprocessing (such as loop isolation).
      Parameters:
      sinks - the sinks of the new instance

  • Method Details

    • prepare

      public void prepare()
      Prepares this WayangPlan for the optimization process if not already done.

    • addSink

      @Deprecated public void addSink(Operator sink)
      Deprecated.
      Use WayangPlan(Operator...).

    • replaceSink

      public void replaceSink(Operator oldSink, Operator newSink)
      Replaces an oldSink with a newSink. As with all modifications to this instance, it is up to the caller to ensure that this does not destroy the integrity of this instance.

    • getSinks

      public Collection<Operator> getSinks()

    • collectReachableTopLevelSources

      public Collection<Operator> collectReachableTopLevelSources()
      Find the source Operators that are reachable from the sinks.
      Returns:
      the reachable sources, only top-level operators are considered
      See Also:
      • getSinks()

    • collectTopLevelOperatorsByName

      public Collection<Operator> collectTopLevelOperatorsByName(String name)
      Find the Operators in this instance by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Operators
      Returns:
      the matching Operators; only top-level (non-nested) ones are considered

    • collectTopLevelOperatorByName

      public Operator collectTopLevelOperatorByName(String name) throws WayangException
      Find the Operator in this instance by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Operators
      Returns:
      the matching Operator or null if none
      Throws:
      WayangException - if there is more than one such Operator

    • prune

      public void prune()
      Prunes Operators that do not (indirectly) contribute to a sink.

    • applyTransformations

      public void applyTransformations(Collection<PlanTransformation> transformations)
      Apply all available transformations in the configuration to this instance.

    • isSane

      public boolean isSane()
      Check that the given WayangPlan is as we expect it to be in the following steps.

    • isLoopsIsolated

      public boolean isLoopsIsolated()
      Tells whether potential loops within this instance have been isolated.

    • setLoopsIsolated

      public void setLoopsIsolated()
      Tells that potential loops within this instance have been isolated.
